H0.text: Which former US boxer is referred to as the ‘Poet laureate of boxing’. Muhammad Ali

H1.text: Which former US boxer is referred to as the ‘Poet laureate of boxing’. Bernard Hopkins

H2.text: Which former US boxer is referred to as the ‘Poet laureate of boxing’. Sugar Ray Leonard

H3.text: Which former US boxer is referred to as the ‘Poet laureate of boxing’. Floyd mayweather sr

A4.text: Ali often used rhyme schemes and spoken word poetry when trash talking in boxing, and also delivered political poetry in his activism outside of boxing.
